game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the hidden city of Eldarath.
game.description: Eldarath is a lost city deep in the heart of the forest, filled with ancient artifacts and treasures. The city is hidden behind a series of puzzles and trials that only the bravest adventurers can overcome.
game.reward: A golden amulet, a map to the city of gold, and 1000 experience points.

task.description: The first trial is hidden in the Whispering Woods. Find and obtain the golden acorn that unlocks the door to the trial.
task.location: Whispering Woods, at the base of the ancient tree

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the ancient ones.
task.description: The second trial is a series of riddles etched into the walls of the lost city. Solve each riddle to unlock the next door.
task.location: The Lost City, in the heart of Eldarath
